text: Ezɨ 5plan gumazir kaba nguibar kam ategha ghua Laisɨn nguibar ekiamɨn oto. Me ghua Laisɨn nguibamɨn itir gumazamizibar garima, men dabirabim Saidonɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazamizibar mɨn dera. Me bar nɨmɨram apiaghav ikia gumazir igharazibar atari puvatɨ. Me ghaze, mɨdorozitam me batoghan kogham. Atrivitam o gumazir dapanitam aghumsɨzir arazitamɨn me gamizir puvatɨ. Me Saidonɨn nguibamɨn saghon ikia, egha dagɨaba bagha biziba igharaz darazi dama, ada amadir puvatɨ.18:7 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
